strings.BANDIT2_DESCRIPTION:
The Bandit is a high-skill combo character that can dish out devastating backstabs while weaving in and out of stealth.<style=cSub>

< ! > Your gun can be reloaded while in stealth – if you can’t afford the downtime, do it while hidden!

< ! > A successful reset on Lights Out can easily be the difference between life and death.

< ! > Backstab is an important part of the Bandit’s kit to utilize, but can be risky against strong melee foes.

< ! > The bleed from Serrated Blade can stack – getting resets on Lights Out against weak enemies can allow you to stack the bleed even higher on a boss.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.BANDIT2_PRIMARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a rifle blast for <style=cIsDamage>330% damage</style>. Can hold up to 4 bullets.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 0.5s/shot</style>
strings.BANDIT2_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a shotgun burst for <style=cIsDamage>5x100% damage</style>. Can hold up to 4 shells.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 5x0.5 | Cooldown: 0.5s/shot</style>
strings.BANDIT2_SECONDARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Throw a hidden blade for <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style>. Critical Strikes also cause <style=cIsHealth>hemorrhaging</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.BANDIT2_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Lunge and slash for <style=cIsDamage>360% damage</style>. Critical Strikes also cause <style=cIsHealth>hemorrhaging</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.BANDIT2_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. Fire a revolver shot for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. Kills grant <style=cIsDamage>stacking tokens</style> for <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> more Desperado damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.BANDIT2_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. Fire a revolver shot for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. Kills <style=cIsUtility>reset all your cooldowns</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.BANDIT2_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Deal <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>, become <style=cIsUtility>invisible</style>, then deal <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style> again.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.CAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION:
The Captain is a unique survivor that can control the battlefield with utility and damage - with help from the UES Safe Travels. <style=cSub>

< ! > Vulcan Shotgun can be used as both a long-range rifle and as a short-range shotgun. Make sure to charge it for the appropriate distance!

< ! > Defensive Microbots can be a unique, powerful way to scale the defensive capabilities of both you and your team.

< ! > Power Tazer can be used to lock down a strong Elite foe while you deal with fodder.

< ! > Orbital Supply Beacon can only be used twice per stage – but make sure you don’t hold onto it too long!</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.CAPTAIN_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a blast of pellets that deal <style=cIsDamage>8x120% damage</style>. Charging the attack narrows the <style=cIsUtility>spread</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.75/hit</style>
strings.CAPTAIN_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Shocking</style>. Fire a fast tazer that deals <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>. Travels farther if bounced.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.CAPTAIN_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Request a <style=cIsUtility>permanent</style> Supply Beacon. Can only be requested <style=cIsUtility>twice per stage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0</style>
strings.CAPTAIN_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Request a <style=cIsDamage>kinetic strike</style> from the <style=cIsDamage>UES Safe Travels</style>. After <style=cIsUtility>20 seconds</style>, it deals <style=cIsDamage>40,000% damage</style> to <style=cIsHealth>ALL</style> characters.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 40s</style>
strings.CAPTAIN_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Request up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> Orbital Probes from the <style=cIsDamage>UES Safe Travels</style>. Each probe deals <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CHEF_DESCRIPTION:
A survivor of high class, Chef specializes in only the most exquisite meals and combos. As a culinary master, Chef uses a variety of practiced skills in tandem for additional benefits.<style=cSub>

< ! > Dice throws a spinning cleaver that lingers in the air. Use Dice again to recall it, dealing damage on the return trip.

< ! > Sear is a close-range attack that scorches any enemies in front of you. Use Glaze to coat enemies in Oil for additional damage.

< ! > Roll into enemies to close the distance, you can’t give a nice sear from far away.

< ! > Combo your skills to create the perfect meal. Enemies killed utilizing 3 or more skills drop food. Food can be consumed by any survivor for healing.
</style>
<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.CHEF_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Killing enemies with 2 or more skills cooks them up and drops a <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> food item. Each skill-buff adds <style=cIsHealing>+8% fractional healing</style>, as well as <style=cIsDamage>+75%</style> pickup scale (additive)
strings.CHEF_PRIMARY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cKeywordName>Boost</style><style=cSub>Boosting Dice throws cleavers in all directions, dealing <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 2.25</style>
strings.CHEF_PRIMARY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKILL:
Throws cleavers in all directions, dealing <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 2.25</style>
strings.CHEF_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Throw a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> cleaver at enemies for <style=cIsDamage>200%</style> damage. Holding the attack <style=cIsDamage>doubles recall damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1, Held: 0.25, Returning: 2.25</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_ALT_BOOST_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cKeywordName>Boost</style><style=cSub><style=cIsUtility>Freezing</style>. Boosting Ice Box launches 1 large ice cube for <style=cIsDamage>1500% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_ALT_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKI:
<style=cSub><style=cIsUtility>Freezing</style>. Launches 1 large ice cube for <style=cIsDamage>1500% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Frost</style>. Launch ice cubes for <style=cIsDamage>3x150% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cKeywordName>Boost</style><style=cSub>Boosting Sear scorches nearby enemies and fires three flaming oil blobs dealing <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style>. Flaming oil blobs leave <style=cIsDamage>ignited oil pools</style> on impact.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKILL:
Scorch nearby enemies and fire three fireballs dealing <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style>. Flaming oil blobs leave ignited oil pools on impact.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.CHEF_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>. Scorch nearby enemies for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. Hitting <style=cIsDamage>Glazed</style> enemies inflicts <style=cIsDamage>Stronger Burn</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.CHEF_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Emit a blast attack dealing <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> damage, inflicting <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style> or <style=cIsUtility>Frost</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Boosts</style> the next Skill used.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.33 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CHEF_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Fire globs of oil in quick succession, dealing <style=cIsDamage>7x200% damage</style>, <style=cIsDamage>Glazing</style>, and <style=cIsDamage>Weakening</style> enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_ALT_BOOST_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cKeywordName>Boost</style><style=cSub>Boosting Oil Spill spews ignited or frozen <style=cIsUtility>oil</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_ALT_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKILL:
Twirl upwards then slam down, exploding with <style=cIsUtility>oil</style> for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Launch again</style> by reactivating this ability before landing, up to <style=cIsDamage>4</style> total.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Twirl upwards then slam down, exploding with <style=cIsUtility>oil</style> for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Launch again</style> by reactivating this ability before landing, up to <style=cIsDamage>4</style> total.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cKeywordName>Boost</style><style=cSub>Boosting Roll applies bleed per second dealing <style=cIsDamage>20% damage</style> to all nearby enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_BOOST_DESCRIPTION_SKILL:
<style=cIsHealth>Bleeding.</style> Speed forward while spinning cutlery to deal an additional <style=cIsDamage>200%</style> damage to all nearby enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.CHEF_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
Charge the rolling pin to <style=cIsUtility>speed</style> forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300%-600% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style> any enemies hit.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_DESCRIPTION:
The Commando is a jack of all trades character that is reliable in all situations of the game. <style=cSub>

< ! > Double Tap is powerful at both short and long range, firing quickly and activating many item effects.

< ! > Effective use of his Tactical Dive is key to dodging heavily telegraphed attacks.

< ! > Suppressive Fire can be used to repeatedly stun a single enemy, or stun a group.

< ! > Phase Rounds can pass through walls use that to your advantage!</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>

</color>
strings.COMMANDO_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Rapidly shoot an enemy for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>. Shoots <style=cIsDamage>6</style> times per second.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.COMMANDO_SECONDARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Fire two close-range blasts that deal <style=cIsDamage>8x200% damage</style> total.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5/hit | Cooldown: 3s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> bullet for <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>. Deals <style=cIsDamage>+40% TOTAL damage</style> (basically equals <style=cIsDamage>+120% base damage</style>) every time it passes through an enemy.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5/hit | Cooldown: 3s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Throw a grenade that explodes for <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style> 1 second after it's first bounce. Can hold up to 2.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Fire repeatedly for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style> per bullet. The number of shots increases with attack speed, equal to <style=cIsDamage>6</style> times the attack speed stat (<style=cIsDamage>6</style> bullets at base attack speed).
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 9s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_UTILITY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Slide</style> on the ground for a short distance. You can <style=cIsDamage>fire while sliding</style>. Propels the player slightly forward and upward if used while airborne. 
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.COMMANDO_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Roll</style> a short distance. Resets momentum while airborne.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.CROCO_DESCRIPTION:
Acrid is a melee-range hybrid who uses powerful poisons to melt tanky enemies. <style=cSub>

< ! > Poison is an extremely powerful DoT - make sure to apply it as often as possible!

< ! > Poison leaves enemies at 1 HP, so prioritize items and drones that help you finish them off.

< ! > Because Acrid has no natural defenses, hit-and-run tactics can help you stay alive.

< ! > Neurotoxin’s low cooldown can help Acrid function as a ranged character in a pinch.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 160 (+48 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 2.5/s (+0.5 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 15 (+3 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 20</style>
</color>
strings.CROCO_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Maul an enemy for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. Every 3rd hit is <style=cIsHealing>Regenerative</style> and deals <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.CROCO_SECONDARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealing>Poisonous</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Regenerative</style>. Bite an enemy for <style=cIsDamage>310% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 2s</style>
strings.CROCO_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealing>Poisonous</style>. Spit toxic bile for <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 2s</style>
strings.CROCO_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealing>Poisonous</style>. Release a deadly disease that deals <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>. The disease spreads to up to <style=cIsDamage>20</style> targets.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CROCO_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Leap in the air, dealing <style=cIsDamage>550% damage</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Reduce</style> the cooldown by <style=cIsUtility>2s</style> for every enemy hit.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.CROCO_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealing>Poisonous</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Leap in the air, dealing <style=cIsDamage>320% damage</style>. Leave acid that deals <style=cIsDamage>25% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Leap Proc: 1 | Pool Proc: 0.1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.ENGI_DESCRIPTION:
The Engineer is a unique class that requires planning and positioning to be successful.<style=cSub>

< ! > Placing mines ahead of time can help cover flanks and tight corridors. 

< ! > The Engineer relies heavily on his Gauss Turrets - remember to place them in a location that is both safe and advantageous.
 
< ! > His Bubble Shield can be a powerful tool against heavily telegraphed boss attacks - and it can protect your allies as well!

< ! > Bouncing Grenades, while powerful, has a hard time hitting mobile targets. Try to keep your Turrets alive to deal with fast or flying monsters.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 130 (+39 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 14 (+2.8 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.ENGI_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Charge up to <style=cIsDamage>8</style> grenades that deal <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style> each.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/grenade</style>
strings.ENGI_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Place a two-stage mine that deals <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>, or <style=cIsDamage>900% damage</style> if fully armed. Can place up to 4.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.ENGI_SKILL_HARPOON_DESCRIPTION:
Enter <style=cIsUtility>target painting mode</style> to launch heat-seeking harpoon missiles that deal <style=cIsDamage>500% damage</style> each. Can store up to 4.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 2.75s</style>
strings.ENGI_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Place a <style=cIsUtility>mobile</style> turret that <style=cIsUtility>inherits all your items.</style> Fires a laser for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage per second</style> that <style=cIsUtility>slows enemies</style>. Can place up to 2.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.6 | Cooldown: 30s</style>
strings.ENGI_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Place a turret that <style=cIsUtility>inherits all your items.</style> Fires a cannon for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>. Can place up to 2.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 30s</style>
strings.ENGI_SPIDERMINE_DESCRIPTION:
Place a robot mine that deals <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style> when an enemy walks nearby. Can place up to 4.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.ENGI_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
Place an <style=cIsUtility>impenetrable shield</style> that blocks all incoming damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 25s</style>
strings.FALSESON_DESCRIPTION:
The False Son is a slow but stalwart close-range warrior. With extreme health and defense, False Son can weather any storm. Use False Son’s durability to stay in the fray and capitalize on his slow but deadly skills.<style=cSub>

< ! > False son closes the distance on enemies with dashes to deliver destruction with his lunar club. Charge the club swing for an explosive slam.

< ! > Laser of the Father and Club of the Forsaken slowly charge for high damage. Health items increase your Lunar Spike count, increasing your power. Try building into items that increase your health and durability.

< ! > For each Lunar Spike you have you gain attack speed and armor and using the Lunar Spikes depletes those bonuses. The more depleted slots of Lunar Spikes you have, the quicker you will move and heal.

< ! > Utilize the long-range potential of your laser and lunar spikes to pick off out-of-reach aerial enemies.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 180 (+54 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 13 (+2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.FALSESON_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: Unused Lunar Spikes give <style=cIsUtility>+5% attack speed</style> and <style=cIsUtility>+2.5 armor</style>. Used spikes give <style=cIsUtility>+5% movement speed</style> and <style=cIsHealing>+2.5 health regeneration</style>. Lunar Stakes count as two Lunar Spikes.
strings.FALSESON_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Swing for <style=cIsDamage>450% damage</style>. Hold the primary and secondary skills to charge a slam for <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.FALSESON_SECONDARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Lunar Ruin</style>. Fire a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style>, <style=cIsDamage>lightning</style> infused Stake for <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>. Gain stakes through <style=cIsHealing>Growth</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 11s</style>
strings.FALSESON_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Lunar Ruin</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Throw a Spike for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage.</style> Gain spikes through <style=cIsHealing>Growth</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.FALSESON_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a piercing laser for <style=cIsDamage>1250% damage</style>, refilling <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> Lunar Spikes. Increases in stock by <style=cIsHealing>Growth</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.FALSESON_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Charge</style> a rapidly hitting laser dealing <style=cIsDamage>240%-1400% damage</style> for <style=cIsUtility>4s</style> and <style=cIsUtility>refill</style> Lunar Spikes. Increases in <style=cIsUtility>duration</style> through <style=cIsHealing>Growth</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.45 | Cooldown: 15s</style>
strings.FALSESON_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Teleport</style> and explode for <style=cIsDamage>150% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>pull</style> enemies. Triple your passive's benefits for <style=cIsUtility>4s</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Growth</style> increases this duration.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0 | Cooldown: 10s</style>
strings.FALSESON_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
Dash a short distance, generating an explosion of <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style> for every enemy hit. <style=cIsUtility>Two uses</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_DESCRIPTION:
The Huntress is an extremely mobile but fragile survivor with a high damage output. <style=cSub>

< ! > Remember that Strafe can be uniquely used while sprinting, allowing you to move at high speeds while still taking out potential threats.

< ! > Blink and Arrow Rain can be used to reposition closer or used as a dodge in a tight spot.

< ! > Laser Glaive will take out pairs of tough targets quickly as it bounces between the two. 

< ! > Arrow Rain has extremely high damage output and also slows enemies inside, making it great for tough, fast enemies.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 90 (+27 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Draw back a volley of <style=cIsDamage>3</style> seeking arrows for <style=cIsDamage>3x100% damage</style>. Critical Strikes fire <style=cIsDamage>6</style> arrows.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.7/hit</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Quickly fire a seeking arrow for <style=cIsDamage>150% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Throw a seeking glaive that bounces up to <style=cIsDamage>6</style> times for <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style>. Damage increases by <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> per bounce.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.8/hit | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Teleport</style> backwards into the sky. Fire up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> energy bolts, dealing <style=cIsDamage>3x900% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Teleport</style> into the sky. Target an area to rain arrows, <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> all enemies and dealing <style=cIsDamage>225% damage per second</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2/hit | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.HUNTRESS_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Disappear</style> and <style=cIsUtility>teleport</style> a short distance. Can store up to <style=cIsUtility>3</style> charges.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 2s</style>
strings.LOADER_DESCRIPTION:
The Loader is a slow but powerful bruiser that can use her grappling hook to uniquely navigate the environment. <style=cSub>

< ! > Scrap Barrier allows Loader to remain in the fight – as long as you’re still punching.

< ! > Grapple Fist can be used to traverse quickly, dodge enemy attacks, or increase your speed for a massive Charged Gauntlet damage boost!

< ! > Charged Gauntlet can be used for both gap closing and as a powerful finishing move to nearby enemies.

< ! > Remember that M551 Pylon can be used as a grapple point for both you and any allied Loaders. </style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 160 (+48 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 2.5/s (+0.5 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 20</style>
</color>
strings.LOADER_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Swing at nearby enemies for <style=cIsDamage>320% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.LOADER_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire your gauntlet forward, <style=cIsUtility>pulling</style> you to the target.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.LOADER_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Slam your fists down, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2000%</style> damage on impact.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.LOADER_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Throw a floating pylon that <style=cIsDamage>zaps</style> up to <style=cIsDamage>6</style> nearby enemies for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>. Can be <style=cIsUtility>grappled</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5 | Cooldown: 20s</style>
strings.LOADER_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Heavy</style>. Charge up a <style=cIsUtility>single-target</style> punch for <style=cIsDamage>2100% damage</style> that <style=cIsDamage>shocks</style> enemies in a cone for <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.LOADER_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Heavy</style>. Charge up a <style=cIsUtility>piercing</style> punch for <style=cIsDamage>600%-2700% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.LOADER_YANKHOOK_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Fire your gauntlet forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>320% damage</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Pulls</style> you to heavy targets. Light targets are <style=cIsUtility>pulled to YOU</style> instead.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.MAGE_DESCRIPTION:
The Artificer is a high burst damage survivor who excels in fighting large groups and bosses alike. <style=cSub>

< ! > Flame Bolt expends stocks quickly but recharges slowly - try to weave in basic attacks between skill casts.

< ! > Direct hits of Charged Nano-Bomb can turn the tide of an otherwise losing battle. 

< ! > Frozen enemies are executed at low health, making it great to eliminate tanky enemies.

< ! > Remember that the Artificer has NO defensive skills - positioning and defensive items are key! </style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.MAGE_PRIMARY_FIRE_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>. Fire a bolt for <style=cIsDamage>280% damage</style>. Hold up to 4.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 1.3s</style>
strings.MAGE_PRIMARY_LIGHTNING_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a bolt for <style=cIsDamage>280% damage</style> that <style=cIsDamage>explodes</style> in a small area. Hold up to 4.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 1.3s</style>
strings.MAGE_SECONDARY_ICE_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Freezing</style>. Charge up a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> nano-spear that deals <style=cIsDamage>400%-1200%</style> damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.MAGE_SECONDARY_LIGHTNING_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Charge up a <style=cIsDamage>exploding</style> nano-bomb that deals <style=cIsDamage>400%-2000%</style> damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Explosion Proc: 1 | Sparks Proc: 0.3 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.MAGE_SPECIAL_FIRE_DESCRIPTION:
About 1/2 hits <style=cIsDamage>Ignite</style>. Burn all enemies in front of you for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage per hit</style>. (<style=cIsDamage>22 hits by default</style>) Does more hits with attack speed.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.MAGE_SPECIAL_LIGHTNING_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Burst into the sky, dealing <style=cIsDamage>800% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.MAGE_UTILITY_ICE_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Freezing</style>. Create a barrier that hurts enemies for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.MERC_DESCRIPTION:
The Mercenary is a high skill melee survivor that uses his many dodges to weave in and out of combat.<style=cSub>

< ! > Whirlwind's air variation can be used like an extra jump in a pinch.

< ! > Getting repeated resets on Blinding Assault is key to increasing both survivability and damage output. However, you do not always need to try for resets – it may result in your death.

< ! > Remember that Eviscerate is an extremely powerful defensive tool to dodge telegraphed attacks.

< ! > Laser Sword deals a ton of damage in a wide area, which is unique for a basic attack.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 20</style>
</color>
strings.MERC_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Slice in front for <style=cIsDamage>130% damage</style>. Every 3rd hit strikes in a greater area and <style=cIsUtility>Exposes</style> enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.MERC_SECONDARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Unleash a slicing uppercut, dealing <style=cIsDamage>550% damage</style> and sending you airborne.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 2.5s</style>
strings.MERC_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Quickly slice horizontally twice, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2x200% damage</style>. If airborne, slice vertically instead.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 2.5s</style>
strings.MERC_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a wind of blades that attack up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>8x100% damage</style>. The last hit <style=cIsUtility>Exposes</style> enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.MERC_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Target the nearest enemy, attacking them for <style=cIsDamage>110% damage</style> repeatedly. <style=cIsUtility>You cannot be hit for the duration</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1/hit | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.MERC_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Dash forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style> and <style=cIsUtility>Exposing</style> enemies after <style=cIsUtility>1 second</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.MERC_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Dash forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>. If you hit an enemy, <style=cIsDamage>you can dash again</style>, up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> total.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.MORE_MUSIC_DESC:
Hello there! @ItsZen_EXE here! I created this more "vanilla" text-only mod for myself initally, but decided to share it publicly due to popular demand! I know I enjoy not needing a wiki page open in the background anymore, and I hope you do too!
<style=cIsUtility>- Check for updates at github.com/ItsZen-EXE/ItsZenEXE-RoR2-Info-Lang-Mod</style>

<style=cKeywordName>In this mod you'll find:</style><style=cIsDamage>- Extended/Corrected info on all items and characters
- Various helpful tips, charts, and clarifications
- Improvements to the ping system and various other small adjustments</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_DESCRIPTION:
The Railgunner is a long-range, single target survivor that can instantly kill any high priority target - and from any range. <style=cSub>

< ! > While she can deal easily with bosses, she can become easily swarmed by small enemies. Try to prioritize area-of-effect items!

< ! > Landing your active reload both speeds up your reload timer while buffing your next railgun shot.

< ! > XQR Smart Rounds is a great way to clean up small fodder, or to shoot around corners.

< ! > Remember that if you use Supercharge, you are incredibly vulnerable while rebooting your systems. Make that shot count!</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.RAILGUNNER_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire aggressive tracking rounds for <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_SECONDARY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Activate your <style=cIsUtility>short-range scope</style>, highlighting <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style> and transforming your weapon into a quick <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style> railgun.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Activate your <style=cIsUtility>long-range scope</style>, highlighting <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style> and transforming your weapon into a piercing <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style> railgun.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> round for <style=cIsDamage>4000% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>150% Weak Point damage</style>. Afterwards, <style=cIsHealth>all your weapons are disabled</style> for <style=cIsHealth>5</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 3 | Cooldown: 15s, Reset upon firing</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_UTILITY_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Throw out a device that <style=cIsUtility>slows down</style> all nearby <style=cIsUtility>enemies and projectiles</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.RAILGUNNER_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
Throw out a device that <style=cIsUtility>pushes</style> you and all nearby enemies away. Can hold up to 2.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.SEEKER_DESCRIPTION:
As a meditative mid-range brawler, Seeker utilizes powerful healing to sustain herself and her team.<style=cSub>

< ! > Every third Spirit Punch in a row fires a high-damaging explosive burst of Soul. Flow between targets while holding the primary to deal maximum damage.

< ! > Seeker’s Unseen Hand heals you for every enemy hit. Prioritize enemy groups to maximize healing.

< ! > Use Sojourn to escape dangerous situations, rush to teammates, or enter the fray. Use Sojourn again to end your flight to deal damage to enemies. While in Sojourn, your health quickly depletes, so use it wisely.

< ! > Meditate places you in a vulnerable state, but increases damage, healing, speed, and more for each successive completion. Positioning and timing are key to empowering you and your teammates. Reach the final gate to receive a team-wide revive.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 115 (+34 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 0.75/s (+0.15 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0</style>
</color>
strings.SEEKER_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire disembodied fists at enemies for <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style>. Every 3rd hit explodes dealing <style=cIsDamage>350% damage.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1.0</style>
strings.SEEKER_SECONDARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Manifest spiraling orbs dealing <style=cIsDamage>150% damage</style>. Hits grant <style=cIsHealing>temporary barrier</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Exhilarate</style> on activation at max orbs.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.SEEKER_SECONDARY_ALT1_TRANQUILITY_DESCRI: <style=cKeywordName>Tranquility</style><style=cSub>Every Tranquility increases Soul Spiral's orbs lifetime by <style=cIsDamage>18%</style> and <style=cIsHealing>temporary barrier gained based on maximum health by 1%</style>.
strings.SEEKER_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Launch a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> phantasmal hand from the ground, dealing <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heals for 3.5% of the damage dealt</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 7s</style>
strings.SEEKER_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Charge</style> a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style>, spectral hand that deals <style=cIsDamage>400%-700% damage</style> and <style=cIsHealing>heals</style> allies. <style=cIsDamage>Multihit</style> three characters to gain <style=cIsUtility>Tranquility</style> and <style=cIsHealing>barrier</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.SEEKER_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Focus your mind</style> to explode <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>, <style=cIsHealing>heal nearby allies</style>, and gain <style=cIsUtility>Tranquility</style>. Reaching max Tranquility <style=cIsHealing>Revives</style> and grants <style=cIsHealing>Saving Grace</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 14s</style>
strings.SEEKER_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Gain <style=cIsHealing>barrier</style> and take <style=cIsUtility>flight</style>. Total <style=cIsHealing>barrier</style> loss or impact creates a <style=cIsUtility>cyclone</style>, <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> allies, and dealing <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style> per second.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 9s</style>
strings.SEEKER_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Take <style=cIsUtility>flight</style> and explode, dealing <style=cIsDamage>500% damage</style>. Exchange <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> per second for <style=cIsDamage>increased damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 8s</style>
strings.SKILL_LUNAR_PRIMARY_REPLACEMENT_DESCRIPT:
Fire a flurry of <style=cIsUtility>tracking shards</style> that detonate after a delay, dealing <style=cIsDamage>120%</style> base damage. Hold up to 12 charges <style=cStack>(+12 per stack, Linear)</style> that reload after 2 seconds <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Explosion Proc: 1 | Initial hit: 0.1</style>
strings.SKILL_LUNAR_SECONDARY_REPLACEMENT_DESCRI:
Charge up a projectile that deals <style=cIsDamage>5x175% damage per second</style> to nearby enemies, exploding after <style=cIsUtility>3</style> seconds to deal <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>root</style> enemies for <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds. Recharges after 5 <style=cStack>(+5 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Maelstrom Proc: 0.2 | Explosion Proc: 1</style>
strings.SKILL_LUNAR_SPECIAL_REPLACEMENT_DESCRIPT:
Dealing damage adds a stack of <style=cIsDamage>Ruin</style> for 10 <style=cStack>(+10 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds. Activating the skill <style=cIsDamage>detonates</style> all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style> plus <style=cIsDamage>120% damage per stack of Ruin</style>. Recharges after 8 <style=cStack>(+8 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.SKILL_LUNAR_UTILITY_REPLACEMENT_DESCRIPT: Fade away, becoming <style=cIsUtility>intangible</style> and gaining <style=cIsUtility>+30% movement speed</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> for <style=cIsHealing>+18.2% <style=cStack>(+18.2% per stack, Linear)</style> of your maximum health</style>. Lasts 3 <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
strings.TOOLBOT_DESCRIPTION:
MUL-T is an aggressive survivor who has the tools necessary for any job! <style=cSub>

< ! > Auto-Nailgun has an extremely high damage output, but has a short range, making it risky but strong.

< ! > Transport Mode can be both a great tool to run down small groups of monsters, or pack a big punch against larger ones. 

< ! > Blast Canister can lock down a large cluster of enemies for a long time, helping line up that perfect shot for both you and your allies.

< ! > Constantly Retooling can help eliminate fragile and weak enemies with Rebar Puncher while still keeping damage output high with Auto-Nailgun. </style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 200 (+60 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 11 (+2.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 12</style>
</color>
strings.TOOLBOT_PRIMARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a piercing rebar that deals <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_PRIMARY_ALT2_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a rocket that explodes for <style=cIsDamage>360% damage</style>. Hold up to 4.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 1.5s</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_PRIMARY_ALT3_DESCRIPTION:
Saw nearby enemies for <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage per second</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Rapidly fire nails for <style=cIsDamage>70% damage</style>. Finishes with a blast of <style=cIsDamage>12</style> nails.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.6</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Launch a canister for <style=cIsDamage>220% damage</style>. Drops <style=cIsDamage>stun</style> bomblets for <style=cIsDamage>5x44% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Canister Proc: 1 | Bomblets Proc: 0.3 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTION:
Enter a heavy stance, equipping both your <style=cIsDamage>primary attacks</style> at once. Gain <style=cIsUtility>100 armor</style>, but lose <style=cIsHealth>-34% movement speed</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_SPECIAL_ALT_QUIT_DESCRIPTION:
Cancel Power Mode and return to normal. Beep beep!
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Passively hold <style=cIsUtility>TWO equipment</style> at once. Activating 'Retool' switches the <style=cIsUtility>active Equipment</style> and <style=cIsDamage>MUL-T's primary attack</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 0.5s</style>
strings.TOOLBOT_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Heavy</style>. Zoom forward, gaining <style=cIsUtility>200 armor</style> and <style=cIsUtility>220% movement speed</style>. Deals <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style> to enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_DESCRIPTION:
REX is a half robot / half plant that uses HP to cast devastating skills from a distance. The plant nor the robot could survive this planet alone – but thankfully they have each other. <style=cSub>

< ! > Natural Toxins is important to reducing the strength of strong enemies for both you and your allies.

< ! > Seed Barrage can be used from any range and has a very low cooldown. Just make sure to watch your HP!

< ! > DIRECTIVE: Disperse can be used to knock enemies away. It can also push flying monsters into walls to kill them.

< ! > A well-aimed Tangling Growth can keep REX in the fight forever. Rooting multiple monsters will guarantee you recover the initial HP costs.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 130 (+39 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 20</style>
</color>
strings.TREEBOT_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire 3 syringes for <style=cIsDamage>3x80% damage</style>. The last syringe <style=cIsDamage>Weakens</style> and <style=cIsHealing>heals for 60% of damage dealt</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5/hit</style>
strings.TREEBOT_SECONDARY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Launch a series of seed bullets into the sky, raining down for <style=cIsDamage>450% damage per second</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5/hit | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealth>15% HP</style>. Launch a mortar into the sky for <style=cIsDamage>450% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 0.5s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_SPECIAL_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a bolt that deals <style=cIsDamage>330% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>injects</style> an enemy. On death, drop 2-8 <style=cIsHealing>healing fruits</style> that heal for <style=cIsHealing>25% HP</style>. Fruiting debuff lasts 10 seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 6s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealth>25% HP</style>. Fire a flower that <style=cIsDamage>roots</style> for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heals 1.5% Max HP for every target hit</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Projectile Proc: 1 | Roots Proc: 0 | Cooldown: 12s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_UTILITY_ALT1_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsHealth>20% HP</style>. Fire a <style=cIsUtility>Sonic Boom</style> that <style=cIsDamage>damages</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>550% damage</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heals 10% Max HP for every target hit</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.TREEBOT_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a <style=cIsUtility>Sonic Boom</style> that <style=cIsDamage>Weakens</style> all enemies hit.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0 | Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_DESCRIPTION:
The Void Fiend is a corrupted survivor that fluctuates between a controlled and corrupted form, each with different strengths and weaknesses.  Managing this curse has become its fate. <style=cSub>

< ! > Void Corruption consumes you over time.  Be sure to manage your health and corruption to be in the right place at the right time!  Healing alters the flow of corruption within your body.

< ! > Drown's range varies greatly between your forms, be prepared to close the gap if you get corrupted, and to retreat if your corruption is wearing thin.

< ! > Flood can be charged in your base form to greater effect.  Take advantage of its instantaneous blast in your corrupt form!

< ! > Suppress can be used to maintain time in your current form.  Be mindful of items that alter this move's potential.</style>

<color=#f1ce52>--- <sprite name="WIP" tint=1> ---
<style=cKeywordName>Health: 110 (+33 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Health Regen: 1/s (+0.2 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Damage: 12 (+2.4 per level)</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Armor: 0 / 100 in Corruption Form</style>
</color>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION: At full <style=cIsVoid>Corruption</style>, transform your abilities into more aggressive forms, and gain <style=cIsUtility>100 armor</style>.
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> long-range beam for <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Corruption Proc: 0.625/hit</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_PRIMARY_UPRADE_TOOLTIP:
<style=cKeywordName>【Corruption Upgrade】</style><style=cSub>Transform into a 2000% damage short-range beam.</style> Number of damage ticks scale with attack speed.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.625/hit</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION:
Fire a plasma bolt for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. Fully charge it for an explosive plasma ball instead, dealing <style=cIsDamage>1100% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_SECONDARY_UPRADE_TOOLTIP:
<style=cKeywordName>【Corruption Upgrade】</style><style=cSub>Transform into a 1100% damage arcing bomb with 2x the radius.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1 | Cooldown: 4s</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_UTILITY_DESCRIPTION:
<style=cIsUtility>Disappear</style> into the Void, <style=cIsUtility>cleansing all debuffs</style> while moving in an <style=cIsUtility>upward arc</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 5s</style>
strings.VOIDSURVIVOR_UTILITY_UPRADE_TOOLTIP:
<style=cKeywordName>【Corruption Upgrade】</style><style=cSub>Transform into a faster, farther forward arc instead.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Cooldown: 5s</style>
